com.vividsolutions.jcs.conflate.linearpathmatch.match
Class LineStringTrimmer

java.lang.Object
  com.vividsolutions.jcs.conflate.linearpathmatch.match.LineStringTrimmer
public class LineStringTrimmer
extends java.lang.Object

Trims a LineString to be within a distance tolerance of a given point.

Version:
1.0

Method Detail

trimEnd

public static com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineString trimEnd(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.LineString inputLine,
                                                             com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate maskPt,
                                                             double distanceTolerance)
Trims the end of a linestring. If only a portion of the first line segment is within the tolerance, an empty linestring is returned.

Parameters:
inputLine - the linestring to trim
maskPt - the point to trim to
distanceTolerance - the distance tolerance to use in trimming
Returns:
the trimmed linestring (which may be empty)

setDistanceTolerance

public void setDistanceTolerance(double distanceTolerance)

trimEnd

public void trimEnd(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Coordinate maskPt)
Computes the input linestring trimmed at the end. If only a portion of the first line segment is within the tolerance, an empty linestring is returned.

Parameters:
maskPt - the point to trim to
